import{get,post,put}from"./web.request";import{ENDPOINTURL}from"../utils/helper";export var loginHandlerData=function loginHandlerData(body){return post("".concat(ENDPOINTURL,"/user/signin"),body);};export var categoryHndlerData=function categoryHndlerData(body){return post("".concat(ENDPOINTURL,"/category/list"),body);};export var addcategoryHandler=function addcategoryHandler(body){return post("".concat(ENDPOINTURL,"/category"),body);};export var editcategoryHandler=function editcategoryHandler(id,body){return put("".concat(ENDPOINTURL,"/category/").concat(id),body);};export var getcategoryHandler=function getcategoryHandler(id){return get("".concat(ENDPOINTURL,"/category/").concat(id));};//banner
export var bannerHndlerData=function bannerHndlerData(body){return post("".concat(ENDPOINTURL,"/banner/list"),body);};//career
export var careerHndlerData=function careerHndlerData(body){return post("".concat(ENDPOINTURL,"/career/list"),body);};//contact
export var contactHandler=function contactHandler(body){return post("".concat(ENDPOINTURL,"/contact"),body);};//gold
export var goldencategoryData=function goldencategoryData(body){return post("".concat(ENDPOINTURL,"/golden/list"),body);};//sliver
export var slivercategoryData=function slivercategoryData(body){return post("".concat(ENDPOINTURL,"/sliver/list"),body);};export var sliverProductListData=function sliverProductListData(body){return post("".concat(ENDPOINTURL,"/product/list"),body);};//products
export var goldProductsListData=function goldProductsListData(body){return post("".concat(ENDPOINTURL,"/goldenproduct/list"),body);};export var goldproductData=function goldproductData(id){return get("".concat(ENDPOINTURL,"/goldenproduct/").concat(id));};
